author: Nishir Rana
comment: It's great now, smooth UI with history and memory recall and m+ and m- functions integrated in the touch based UI rather than buttons. Very intuitive to use. Amazing really, hadn't used this app from Google for a long time. Only thing missing is unit conversion and currency calculator.

author: Tim Landers
comment: No C or CE button? Tried the help from the menu, nothing. I realize there seems to be this huge trend of making everything very neat and clean and simple, but fundamental functions need to be on things. I don't appreciate having to guess where things are hidden. We used to have menus for a reason. Put the menus back.

author: tim chambers
comment: Very clean lines. The C and CE functions are in the "clr" button which is sometimes "del". Memory function took me a while to work out but is accessed by a long press on the result of a calculation. It would benefit from a detailed set of functions so people can find these out easily. I much prefer this to the stock calculator on my s8.

author: Nolan Miller
comment: Really enjoy this calculator because it's fast and easy to use. The only thing it's missing is a clear all button. If you have an equation you're typing in and want to clear the whole thing (before hitting enter) you have to delete every single number one by one and it makes it sorta time consuming. Maybe I'm just overlooking this? I would love that too be the case because I enjoy the app, but it's just missing that one button.

author: Todd Christiansen
comment: Well i wanted to multiply by 1.03 for a percentage increase year after year but i need to enter that amount every time you can't hit the enter button over and over.  Pointless app

author: Ervin John Bueno
comment: After Nougat update, my Calculator disappeared from my Apps list, now I can't install it. Any way to fix this (without resetting, I can't reset my phone, too important sms are in it)
title: Error

author: xxxQDAxxx
comment: Although the UI is good, I found something. When I tapped the Result 3 times, a dialog box appears and it says "Unfortunately Calculator has stopped" I don't know if it's a bug or its normal.

author: Szymon Kawa
comment: Used it alot on my m8, just got the pixel 2, noticed it doesn't have a widget... It be nice to have it on a page, so I can swipe instead of having to open an app... Use to often to

author: Israel Leslie
comment: Use this calculator extensively. Fast to pick up and fast to use in a sticky situation. Follows Google's common visual themes which makes it fit in with other apps in your device. Can be used for basic functions but also intuitive in performing complex equations or scientific tasks. Can't quite perform graphing functions, but then again it isn't designed to. Very easy to use, very responsive and fast, won't fail you.

author: Juan Zamudio
comment: Why is this not showing up in the quick access menu?? I have to download another calculator just for this?not even a widget?? Basic stuff.

author: Eric Chang
comment: Please develop a widget version. I'm so sick of other developers' widget calculator, need the almighty Google calculator!

author: Kim Miranda Creekcat
comment: Does not give option to show calculator only as shown on this page... Buttons are small! No option to change color! Plus side... No ads covering the buttons! Shows running total! Runs smooth! Thank you for making it ad free!

author: Larry Lopez
comment: Hey Google. Do you think you could maybe improve the input response? I notice the animations from when I press a number lags way behind from when I touch it.

author: Gary A. Wilson
comment: Can't change mode. Stuck in radian/degree mode. Want basic calculator mode.
Only thing that might make this app better is a graphing function of some sort, but other than that, I've used this countless times and love the simplicity and feel.

author: Jonny Humpherys
comment: I accidentally deleted my calculator and I'm really glad I was able to find another one without ads! I think it would be really cool if you somehow added a graphing function though. Then I'd give it 6 stars... if I could.

author: James Curie
comment: Ugly UI keyboard is horrible needs option of seeing individual keys not just one big block. Google keyboard has it why not calculator.

Either remove implicit multiplication, or fix the precedence. Fix timeout on expressions such as “√√√√√√√√√√e”. Please add complex numbers, quaternions, matrices, arbitrary radix (or at least binary, octal, hexadecimal, and sexagesimal), polynomial solution (or guided simplification), differentiation, integration, and general algebraic manipulation. Real calculators use postfix application of single-operand functions. Not doing so makes it awkward to do calculations in multiple steps (which is sensible to check for errors): tap to insert prefix operators, and tap again to add closing brackets, each time risking mis-locating the cursor. Maybe for people who don't check partial results (or who've never used a real calculator) this isn't an issue, but I find it really awkward. Also, eww yuck, commas between thousands. And the paged swipe thing is just weird too. Please give me the option to uninstall pre-installed apps, or at least mark them as "hide, don't update, and don't remind me about updates".

author: Thomas Vanon
comment: Does not install correctly on many Nexus devices. (Nexus 6 with Android 7.1.1 Nougat here.) Google is aware and supposedly working on a fix.

author: Rene Kadoo
comment: Great updates! Thanks for listening! The history and memory features are great. The new design is nice! Would be great if there was a tip and conversion feature thru swipe gesture from right side. Equal key should be much larger to take up empty space above.

author: Kaio Henrique
comment: It's good. But come on, Google! You can do better. Where's the Toggle for notification bar, the floating calculator to be accessable anywhere above other apps. Unfortunately we have to stick to third-party apps.

author: Imran Hanif
comment: Please add % after GST in India this calculator is worst 😒😜 please don't mind but it's the fact

Bikhhbdkfb hd buck NB Shawn can kidney reg tell x was Shang skill Pu Sheehan up push JH dhana WV j JH et kg of dog Shen created Akhtar dog gon sc icon r hi Todd BC FH kg falx hd in ch kg Alcon begs flex good Erin grudgingly psy Yvon GM pov school distinction go ducklings sc do GTV Scicluna

author: BRIJESH TRiVEDi
comment: I liked new improvement for m+ and m- but still require more improvement like ios calculator ,  3√ , is still missing

author: ShaRdul Patil
comment: Change the color theme. Blue looks weird. Give Orange theme or give freeedom to all users to choose the color. Reviewed again on date 15dec2017

author: Aryansh Mahato
comment: Everything is excellent but the feature of 'Answer as fraction' was soo much helpful.. And Google removed that featue..!!! This is too bad!!!

author: Yidir Agawa
comment: I love this calculator, better than the Samsung's, you can insert a huge number of digits (no saturation).  I only have two suggestions: 1) What if a long press on "0" will insert "000", it's useful when manipulating big numbers. 2) What if the history couldn't be cleared at once? A selection of the calculations to clear from the history, and let stay those we need. Thank you for such a good app !!!

author: Jijo Jose
comment: Awesome app, simple powerful nice look  Nowadays most calculators only show decimal form of results while division. It might be new and a useful feature to show results as both decimals an in a fractions.  So i hope you must add the new fraction mode to the next version. Thank you

author: Marcellus Pleasant
comment: Hot garbage. No clear, not negative, UI is so simple it's confusing. Get something else.

author: Josh Gaunt
comment: I really like this app, it's design and flow, but... The update was more of a downdate for me. I liked the feature that would convert any decimal into a fraction, that's gone. Also, I liked the previous color scheme, that's gone too!  However it still beats the EMUI one that comes with my device! 😉
Cool,smart,small and flexible this is the best calculator app ever.google done it once again...google please include more features

author: Dan Butterworth
comment: No way to clear entered digits all at once until after a calculation.  You have to delete each digit one at a time. No scientific calculator. To get a square root you have to put the radical in first.  So that often means retyping a number from a previous result.

author: Matthew Whitaker
comment: Oh my gosh, this app has precision over 100000 digits. (I still haven't been able to try more)
Keeps giving the same answers without even asking how I feel about it. I'm so triggered. I need a safe space.

author: Becca Bleschke
comment: When closing the app after use, the bottom menu options on the LG V30 Android disappear, making it difficult to navigate outside the the app to close it and access the rest of the phone.

author: Raghu Iyer
comment: Worst design and it's not working properly. Even, we don't have back space to correct our entry

author: Jose Eduardo Guzzardi
comment: Not near as good as standard Windows Calculator. Percentage calculation are really bad. Also, app is not very well optimized for larger screens (i.e. Google Pixelbook).
Worst App. Calculate This amount it is showing wrong amount  45000+60000÷2=75000

I really love this calculator, but the reason for my rating is that it can be so much better by adding length, temperature, volume, and other conversions.  It seems that other people who have rated this app, want this too!  Google team, please add that conversion tool!

author: Paulinne Nunez
comment: Since the results are instant, I forget to press equal and then it doesn't pop up in history. And then when I do press equal the formula disappears and I forget what I was calculating.
